name: Ruined Castle
description: The crumbling remains of a once-mighty castle stand as a testament to lost glory, with broken towers and collapsed walls. The ruins can provide shelter and hiding places, while the historical significance and potential hidden chambers attract treasure hunters and scholars.
atmosphere: Crumbling towers and collapsed walls reveal chambers once filled with royal splendor. Ivy and moss cover weathered stone while ravens nest in broken battlements. The air carries centuries of dust and decay. Faded tapestries hang in tatters alongside rusted weapons and armor.
